location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to J H Pelly Esquire, Deputy Military Pay Master General at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to John Hinde Pelly Esquire, Deputy Military Pay Master General at Bombay, acknowledging the receipt of a communication sent on 17 September 1810, returning him all recent bills for signature.
